title: Mr. August
description:
From international bestselling author Nicole S. Goodin, comes a new standalone, Student/Teacher Romance.
Liam Conrad.University lecturer.Sexy as hell.... And considering risking his career.Perry Jenkins.University student.Natural beauty.... And crushing on her teacher.From the moment Liam and Perry lock eyes, sparks fly.Liam never expected a woman to make him look twice, let alone one that would turn up in the front row of his class.Perry's focus has always been to graduate with top marks, but she's finding herself distracted by her sexy, off limits professor.Liam is scared to share his past.Perry is struggling to hide her feelings.Both start to fall hard, but is their student/teacher relationship the only reason that Liam wants to keep Perry as his dirty little secret?
author: Nicole S. Goodin
